Description:
You come to a mountain peak where you find a nest of harpies, you realize that inside the nest there are two very young harpies that seem hungry.

Flying over the nest there is a large harpy protecting it and that does not take its eyes off you.

Any wrong move will provoke the attack of the matriarch.
DescriptionAction: What do you want to do?
